        @PostMapping("/user/validate")
@PreAuthorize("isAnonymous() or hasRole(\'ADMIN\')")
public java.lang.String validate​(@AuthenticationPrincipal
                                 CustomUserDetails customUserDetails,
                                 @Validated @ModelAttribute("user")
                                 UserAddDto user,
                                 org.springframework.validation.BindingResult result,
                                 org.springframework.ui.Model model)
        Validate a new user information and add user
        Parameters:
        customUserDetails - user details
        user - user information
        result - result of validation
        model - if result is false, it will have user and error message of validation
        Returns:
        add user page or user list page
